attributes.action: Give Us Our Daylight & Family Times Back & Greater Sense of Wellbeing
attributes.additional_details:
The hours of daylight/sunshine lost in the mornings in early summer when 99% of people are in bed,should be added to the end of the day so putting the clocks forward by a further hour.
Would give us a greater feeling of there actually being a better summer year on year.
We have all had our childhoods&family times taken away from us.
Productivity would improve in the work place&people would be more tolerant&friendly to each other&people would want to holiday in the UK from the UK&from abroad.
As soon as the sun goes down in the summer when families are having BBQ's etc everyone goes inside because it gets chilly.
Our outlook on life would improve as a nation with an extra hours daylight in an evening in the summer. Health would improve but bringing families&friends closer together.We would be more European in our attitudes&be less stressful.
Winter sunshine as no benefit to us.
We spend most our waking lives generally in darkness than in light.
